actor_awards.notes: Known for her husky voice and temperamental nature, she was a major star of stage and screen who made only 16 films. She won the New York Film Critics Circle Award for Best Actress for 'Three Comrades' (1938).

filmography.title: The Shop Around the Corner
filmography.role_description: A prickly leather goods shop employee who is unaware that her bickering coworker is actually her romantic pen pal.
filmography.plot: Two employees at a gift shop can barely stand each other, without realizing that they are falling in love through the post as each other's anonymous pen pal.

filmography.title: Three Comrades
filmography.role_description: A young, impoverished German aristocrat with a history of illness who marries one of three war buddies.
filmography.plot: Three German friends in the post-WWI era fall in love with a dying woman.

filmography.title: The Mortal Storm
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a Jewish science professor whose family is torn apart by the rise of the Nazi party in 1933.
filmography.plot: A family in 1933 Germany is torn apart when the father, a Jewish science professor, refuses to bow to the new Nazi regime.

filmography.title: The Good Fairy
filmography.role_description: A naive and kind-hearted usherette who tries to do a good deed for a waiter, leading to comedic complications.
filmography.plot: A naive usherette tries to help a waiter by manipulating a wealthy businessman.

filmography.title: Only Yesterday
filmography.role_description: A woman who has a brief affair with a soldier before WWI, raises their son alone, and meets him again years later.
filmography.plot: A woman has an illegitimate child with a soldier who forgets her, but they meet again years later when he is in financial trouble.

filmography.title: Little Man, What Now?
filmography.role_description: The loyal and optimistic wife of a struggling clerk in depression-era Germany.
filmography.plot: A young couple struggles to survive and keep their love alive in the poverty and political turmoil of post-WWI Germany.

filmography.title: Back Street
filmography.role_description: A woman who sacrifices her own happiness to be the mistress of a married banker for many years.
filmography.plot: A woman becomes the mistress of a married man and remains devoted to him for decades, living in the shadows of his life.

filmography.title: So Ends Our Night
filmography.role_description: A Jewish refugee fleeing Nazi persecution across Europe who falls in love with a fellow exile.
filmography.plot: Three refugees without passports struggle to survive in Europe as they flee from the Nazis.

filmography.title: The Shopworn Angel
filmography.role_description: A cynical, hard-bitten actress who is softened by the adoration of a naive soldier heading to WWI.
filmography.plot: A cynical showgirl meets a naive soldier about to ship out to World War I, and they develop a touching relationship.

filmography.title: The Shining Hour
filmography.role_description: The supportive wife of a wealthy farmer who sees her marriage threatened by her brother-in-law's new wife.
filmography.plot: A nightclub dancer marries a farmer, causing family tension and a romantic triangle involving her husband's brother.

filmography.title: Cry 'Havoc'
filmography.role_description: A strong-willed army nurse leading a group of volunteers in Bataan during WWII.
filmography.plot: A group of female volunteers serve as nurses on Bataan while under siege by Japanese forces.

filmography.title: So Red the Rose
filmography.role_description: A Southern belle who must mature quickly as the Civil War tears her family and plantation apart.
filmography.plot: A Southern family struggles to maintain their way of life during the American Civil War.

filmography.title: Next Time We Love
filmography.role_description: An actress whose marriage to a reporter is strained by their conflicting careers and long separations.
filmography.plot: A young couple tries to balance their careers and their marriage as their jobs take them to different parts of the world.

filmography.title: The Moon's Our Home
filmography.role_description: A temperamental movie star who marries a famous writer incognito, neither knowing the other's true identity.
filmography.plot: A socialite and a writer marry without knowing each other's fame, leading to a series of comedic misunderstandings.

filmography.title: Appointment for Love
filmography.role_description: A dedicated doctor who marries a playwright but insists on maintaining her independent career.
filmography.plot: A playwright marries a doctor, but their conflicting schedules and views on marriage lead to trouble.

filmography.title: No Sad Songs for Me
filmography.role_description: A woman diagnosed with terminal cancer who keeps her condition secret while preparing her husband for life after she is gone.
filmography.plot: A woman dying of cancer tries to find a new wife for her husband and a mother for her child before she passes away.
